campSites.location: Nine miles northwest of Moab on US 191 and then 23 miles southwest on Utah 313 to the end of the highway.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, mountain biking, Dark Sky.

campSites.location: 20 miles north of the town of Hanksville on Highway 24, turn at Temple Mountain junction, follow signs 12 miles to park.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, mountain biking, Disc Golf, Dark Sky.

campSites.location: Camping, hiking, mountain biking, Horse Riding, Dark Sky.
campSites.recreationOptions: 41 miles north of Salt Lake City. Take Exit 332 off Interstate 15, then drive west on Antelope Drive to the park entrance gate. The park is 7 miles west of the entrance gate across the Davis County Causeway.

campSites.location: Located seven miles north of the city of Vernal on US 191.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, boating, swimming, OHV riding, hiking, fishing, Dark Sky

campSites.location: Located 12 miles south of the town of Morgan along S.R. 66.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, boating, swimming, rock climbing, hiking, fishing, Dark Sky

campSites.location: From Salt Lake City: Take I-80 East to US 40 East, then take the Mayflower exit (#8). Turn east towards the reservoir on SR-319 which dead ends inside the park.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, boating, swimming, rock climbing, hiking, pets allowed, fishing, Dark Sky

campSites.location: 45 miles east of Salt Lake City. Take exit 155 from I-80 and travel five miles southeast on SR 32.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, boating, swimming, hiking, fishing, Dark Sky.

campSites.location: Located 21 miles southwest of Richfield on Interstate 70. Located 17 Miles east of !-15 on Interstate 70.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, museum, petroglyphs, hiking, mountain biking, Dark Sky.

campSites.location: 25 miles west of Bluff along US 163, west on SR 261, then southwest on SR 316.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, mountain biking, OHV riding, Dark Sky.

campSites.location: In the town of Boulder, Utah.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, museum, hiking, mountain biking.

campSites.location: 12 miles south of the town of Marysvale, just off US 89.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, OHV riding, boating, fishing, mountain biking.

campSites.location: From I15, take exit 288 for UT-140 towards 14600 S. Turn East. Turn right at light onto Minuteman Drive. Travel approximately 2.5 miles and turn left at Flight Park sign. The Flight park is on the left.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, paragliding, and hang gliding.

campSites.siteName: Camp Floyd - Stage Coach Inn State Park
campSites.location: Located in Fairfield, 22 miles southwest of Lehi on State Route 73.
campSites.recreationOptions: Historic driving tour, museum, stage coach and wagon rides. No overnight camping.

campSites.location: 13 miles north of the city of Vernal on US 191.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, boating, fishing, hiking, geo cache, dinosaur tracks, fossils.

campSites.siteName: Edge Of The Cedars State Park Museum
campSites.location: Within the Blanding city limits. Follow signs from US 191 to the park.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, musuem, mountain biking, Puebloan ruins.

campSites.location: From I-15, take Cedar City 200 N exit (SR 56) and go east, turn north on Main St (SR 130) for a 1/2 m.
campSites.recreationOptions: Muesum, hiking, picnic.

campSites.location: located roughly 15 miles northwest of Moab in Grand County.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, OHV riding, mountain biking, fossils.

campSites.location: 50 W. Capitol Ave. Fillmore, UT 84631
campSites.recreationOptions: Muesum, picnic.

campSites.location: Off State Route 10 at the town of Ferron, four miles west on Ferron Canyon Road.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, hiking, OHV riding, mountain biking, fishing, golfing.

campSites.location: Located about 10 miles northeast of Croydon in Morgan County.
campSites.recreationOptions: Camping, paddling, swimming, fishing.
